price: 33 Or, Allah ne saurait les châtier alors que tu te trouves parmi eux, de même qu’Il ne saurait les punir s’ils implorent Son pardon.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمۡۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna al-lahu liyuʿadhibahum wa-anta fīhim wamā kāna al-lahu muʿadhibahum wahum yastaghfirūna
